description:
Saves data to a Google Spreadsheet.
The Spreadsheet should be shared to with `data-flo@data-flo.iam.gserviceaccount.com` and given `can edit` permission.

input.name: url
input.description:
A valid URL of a Google Spreadsheet to be updated.
The Spreadsheet should be shared to with `data-flo@data-flo.iam.gserviceaccount.com` and given `can edit` permission.

input.name: sheetname
input.description:
The title of Sheet to which the data will be written.
If unspecified, `sheet` defaults to the first sheet in the spreadsheet.

input.name: header row
input.description:
The index of the sheet row which contains column headers.
If unassigned, `header row` defaults to `1` (the first row).

input.name: data
input.description: The data to be appended to the Google Spreadsheet.

input.name: id column
input.description: The name of the ID column in `data` and in the Google Spreadsheet.

input.name: append rows
input.description: Specifies whether to create a new row when it is missing from the Google Spreadsheet. Defaults to `True`.

input.name: append columns
input.description:
Specifies whether to create a column when it is missing from the Google Spreadsheet.
Defaults to `True`.

input.name: resize sheet
input.description:
Specifies whether to resize the Google Spreadsheet when more rows and columns are needed.
Defaults to `True`.

output.name: updated
output.description: A list of row IDs which have been updated.

output.name: created
output.description: A list of row IDs which have been appended when `append rows` is set to `True`.

output.name: skipped
output.description: A list of row IDs which are missing from the Google Spreadsheet.

output.name: data
output.description: The data appended to the Google Spreadsheet.
